ncrsdatagroup.abcd:ProjectTitle: Collecting trip to the Azores in 1979

ncrsGatheringSites.abcd:LocalityText: AZO.016: Azores, Sao Miguel, S coast, E of Ponta Delgada, Ponta de Rosto do Cao; 37°44'N 25°38'W; rocky shore with tide pools and large basin; shore- and snork.; 23.ix.1979
AV.690909t: Italy, Sicilia, prov. Trápani, Trápani; 9.ix.1969
CANCAP-VII, Sta. 7.033: Cape Verde Islands, SE of Cima; 14°58'N 24°39'W; depth 40 m, dark grey Foraminifera sand; van Veen grab; 23.viii.1986
5.006: Azores, S of Sao Miguel; 37°42'N 25°30'W; depth 35 m, fine sand, mainly calcareous; van Veen grab; 26.v.1981., Sta. 5.006
CANCAP-VI, Sta. 6.144: Cape Verde Islands, SW of Sao Vicente; 16°49'N 25°06'W; depth 51 m, agglutinated calcareous sand; 1.2 m Agassiz trawl; 20.vi.1982
